scripts.start: cd stocky-backend && npx nodemon --exec babel-node src/server.js
scripts.build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cd stocky-frontend && npm install && npm i -D postcss@latest&& npm run build && mv build ../stocky-backend/src && cd ../stocky-backend && npm install
scripts.herokuBuild: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && rm -rf stocky-backend/src/build && cd stocky-frontend && npm install && npm i -D postcss@latest&& npm run build && mv build ../stocky-backend/src && cd ../stocky-backend && npm install
